#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int x;
        cin>>x;
        int i,j;
        int a[102],b[102];
        for(i=0;i<x;i++)
            cin>>a[i];
        for(i=0;i<x;i++)
            cin>>b[i];
        int max,count;
        max=count=1;
        for(i=0;i<x;i++)
        {
            for(j=0;j<x;j++)
            {
                if(i==j)
                    continue;
                else
                {
                    if(a[j]<b[i] && b[j]>=b[i])
                        count++;
                }
            }
            if(count>max)
                max=count;
            count=1;
        }
        cout<<max<<endl;
    }
}
